amendment.description: To set aside funding for a defense and security research center.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1704 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1704 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR S11539-11544; text: CR S11540) To set aside funding for a defense and security research center.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1704 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
